author: rey4
msg: add apr dependency (perl bindings use apr_time_now)

author: jpieper
msg: Issue #1788: Make external definitions be handled in the order they
are defined.  Define a new svn_wc_parse_externals_description2 that
keeps track of the order in which the externals were defined.  When
comparing an old externals list to a new one during updates or
checkouts, first iterate over all the old entries in order, then over
svn_parse_externals_description2, then compare the two lists of
externals manually to ensure that all entries will be handled in
the order they were originally defined in.

author: sussman
msg: Rev the ABI version for RA layers, in preparation for svn 1.1.
This prevents a 1.1 client from accidentally loading a 1.0 RA library,
and then segfaulting when attempting to call a non-existent vtable func.
